2+1.sig_info: After filling a bar of Power, Magik has a 20% chance to enter a state of Limbo for 3 seconds. The chance increases by 12.5% after filling 2 bars, and by 25% after filling 3 bars. Based on current Signature Level, chances are multiplied by 1 to 100%.

SPECIAL ATTACKS: Opponents do not generate Power from these attacks.
LIMBO: Deals 20.75 Energy Damage per second. Any damage Magik takes during this period is rewound when the effect expires.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to Nullify. If a Buff is removed in this way, an additional 49.8 Energy Damage is dealt.
100% chance to enter a state of Limbo for the duration of these attacks.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to enter a state of Limbo for the duration of these attacks.
85% chance to Power Lock, severing the target's flow of Power for 9 seconds.
100% chance to Power Steal, taking 33% enemy Power as your own.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to Nullify, removing all Buffs and increasing your Attack by 53.95 for each Buff removed.
